[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Concat {
            left: Concat {
                left: LiteralString {
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        7,
                    ),
                    value: "foo",
                },
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    13,
                ),
                right: LiteralString {
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        15,
                    ),
                    value: "bar",
                },
            },
            span: Span(
                1,
                21,
            ),
            right: LiteralString {
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    23,
                ),
                value: "baz",
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                28,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
